name: Scary Horror Survive Chapter 2
description:
Are you the Survivor? Then be ready you have to play this adventurous horror game and survive in this game. Visit the old house and be aware of the evil, because he is chasing you. You have to complete the missions and save yourself from the bad end.

Features:
- Survival Horror
- Intense Gameplay Missions
- Hidden hints in the gameplay
- Add Chapters in-game
